member.name: IQueryContinueWithStatus.SetStatusMessage
member.summary: Enables the credential provider to set status messages as it attempts to complete .
member.param: A pointer to the status message.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IQueryContinueWithStatus
member.summary: Exposes methods that provide a standard mechanism for credential providers to call while attempting to connect to the network to determine if they should continue these attempts. Credential providers can also use this interface to display messages to the user while attempting to establish a network connection.
